title: Data Analytics In Acct
description: Students will learn to apply advanced analytical techniques in business settings to facilitate better decision making, with a particular focus on financial and managerial reporting. Credit not allowed for both MGT 4046 and MGT 6046.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ACCT 2101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MGT 2210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MGT 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PUBP 3120 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
